results.deck: An improvisational party game for up to 8 players.
results.name: Quiplash

results.deck: An adventure game that expands upon the Punch Line anime.
results.name: Punch Line

results.deck: Players take out their enemies, one calculated move at a time, in this action tale of revenge.
results.name: RONIN

results.deck: A third person hack and slash game set in feudal Japan featuring vegetable ninja and samurai.
results.name: Yasai Ninja

results.deck: Indivisible is an action RPG from Lab Zero Games, the makers of Skullgirls.
results.name: Indivisible

results.deck: The sequel to the original Cook, Serve, Delicious in which players run a restaurant kitchen.
results.name: Cook, Serve, Delicious! 2!!

results.deck: A spiritual successor to the Mega Man Legends franchise by Comcept.
results.name: Red Ash

results.deck: This arcade version of Cosmo Police Galivan is more straightforward and action-focused than the NES game of the same name.
results.name: Cosmo Police Galivan

results.deck: An action game based on the Crows manga about a school for delinquents where lessons are learned using their fists.
results.name: Crows: Burning Edge

results.deck: The 2015 edition of 2K and Yuke's WWE 2K franchise.
results.name: WWE 2K16

results.deck: A musical top-down shooter.
results.name: Myriad

results.deck: Butt Sniffin Pugs is a pug simulation enhanced by the ability to run like a dog and sniff butts.
results.name: Butt Sniffin Pugs

results.deck: Fall off the track and keep rolling in this procedurally generated racing game.
results.name: Super Impossible Road

results.deck: A side-scrolling platformer based on the 2015 animated film.
results.name: The Peanuts Movie: Snoopy's Grand Adventure

results.deck: A spin-off from the long-running JRPG series, Builders tasks the player with rebuilding the ruined world of Alfegard... using some very familiar looking square blocks.
results.name: Dragon Quest Builders

results.deck: The latest addition to the Arc System Works anime fighting game franchise, BlazBlue. Featuring new characters, new story, and a couple new game mechanics.
results.name: BlazBlue: Central Fiction

results.deck: Moero!! Pro Yakyuu is a remake of the first game in the Moero!! series (known as Bases Loaded in the US) and the first Moero!! game released since 2004.
results.name: Moero!! Pro Yakyuu

results.deck: Hob is an action-adventure that takes place in a world that is beautiful and full of life on its surface, yet filled with failing machinery beneath the surface. The player is encouraged to learn and discover through exploring the world as the game offers no narration or dialogue.
results.name: Hob

results.deck: Grand Ages: Medieval is a grand strategy game where players attempt to conquer all of Europe in 1050 A.D. It was released on September 26th 2015 for PC, Mac, and PlayStation 4.
results.name: Grand Ages: Medieval

results.deck: An HD remake of the PS2 game Odin Sphere, with reworked gameplay and additional content.
results.name: Odin Sphere Leifthrasir

results.deck: Bard's Gold is a 2D arcade platformer with light RPG elements.
results.name: Bard's Gold

results.deck: An isometric tactical-RPG developed by King Art Games.
results.name: The Dwarves

results.deck: A cart racer that pits death against the elderly.
results.name: Coffin Dodgers

results.deck: A game from Deck 13 and Focus Home Interactive (Lords of the Fallen). The Surge is an action RPG set in a dystopian sic-fi future.
results.name: The Surge

results.deck: A standalone release for The Last of Us's story DLC, Left Behind, centering on Ellie and her friend Riley set before the main game.
results.name: The Last of Us: Left Behind

results.deck: The World Rally Championship license moves to new developer Kylotonn Games for the 2015 season.
results.name: WRC 5

results.deck: BigBen and HB Studios adds the official Rugby World Cup license to their 2015 Rugby game.
results.name: Rugby World Cup 2015

results.deck: A side-scrolling RPG developed by Tri-Ace that is a spiritual successor to the Valkyrie Profile series, sharing a lot of the same creative staff and gameplay.
results.name: Exist Archive: The Other Side of the Sky

results.deck: The third game in the open world crime series. Mafia III follows Vietnam veteran, mixed-race Lincoln Clay in 1960s New Orleans, when the racism is bluming, as he aspires for revenge against those who have harmed his family.
results.name: Mafia III

results.deck: A modern take on arcade space shooters.
results.name: Zotrix

results.deck: Broken Bots is a team based top-down shooter in which players battle with malfunctioning robots. Players compete against each other in futuristic environments and various game modes such as 'King of the Hill' or 'Capture the Flag'.
results.name: Broken Bots

results.deck: Pang Adventures is a 2016 entry in the Buster Bros./Pang series, by PastaGames and DotEmu.
results.name: Pang Adventures

results.deck: The first revision in the Guilty Gear Xrd series.
results.name: Guilty Gear Xrd -Revelator-

results.deck: The third title in the Dead or Alive Xtreme series, which is currently only planned for release in Japan and Asian territories.
results.name: Dead or Alive Xtreme 3: Fortune

results.deck: Originally released as a PlayStation exclusive Koei-Tecmo/Omega Force Attack on Titan game (PS3, PS4 and Vita), this game will also release on Steam and Xbox One outside of Japan. It features a focus on quick action and item management like other games based on the franchise while exploring the story of the 2013 anime.
results.name: Attack on Titan

results.deck: An assassination-focused stealth-action game set in the World War II & Cold War eras, about a KGB agent secretly working with the CIA. Similarly to the Hitman games, it features open levels with many different ways of taking out a target.
results.name: Alekhine's Gun

results.deck: The sequel to Ludosity's top-down action-adventure game.
results.name: Ittle Dew 2

results.deck: Read Only Memories is a cyberpunk adventure game focused on the dark side of technology in the year 2064.
results.name: Read Only Memories

results.deck: Ultimate Chicken Horse is a party platformer for up to four people where the players place platforms, traps and hazards and try to make the level too difficult for their friends, but easy enough for them.
results.name: Ultimate Chicken Horse

results.deck: When the hotel double books rooms, the only answer is to have an all-out battle with the other potential guests to secure a reservation.
results.name: Check In, Knock Out

results.deck: FutureGrind is a trick-based platformer from Milkbag Games.
results.name: FutureGrind

results.deck: When Jenny Leclue's mother is framed for the murder of a beloved town figure, the young detective must explore her hometown, Arthurton and investigate the dark secrets it holds within in order to clear her mother's name.
results.name: Jenny LeClue

results.deck: The sixth mainline entry in the Summon Night strategy RPG franchise.
results.name: Summon Night 6: Lost Borders

results.deck: A stealth adventure game inspired by Film Noir.
results.name: Calvino Noir

results.deck: It's 3 AM and your neighbors are partying hard, stop the party by any means necessary.
results.name: Party Hard

results.deck: Players attempt to survive as long as they can in this shmup by WarlockArts.
results.name: MasterCube

results.deck: Fight as bread in this multiplayer brawler.
results.name: The Bread Pub Brawlers

results.deck: Match 3 puzzler in a toy factory.
results.name: Tina's Toy Factory

results.deck: Fish as a Redneck with dynamite.
results.name: Dynamite Fishing: World Games

results.deck: 3D puzzle game designed by students at Sheffield Hallam University.
results.name: PieceFall

results.deck: Old school bombing arena game.
results.name: Bombing Busters

results.deck: A psychological horror game from Bloober Team SA.
results.name: Layers of Fear

results.deck: Hatsune Miku and her vocaloid friends are back in the first entry of the series on 8th Gen consoles.
results.name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva X

results.deck: A compilation containing the remastered versions of the Resident Evil remake and Resident Evil Zero.
results.name: Resident Evil Origins Collection

results.deck: Headlander is a 2D side-scrolling game set in a 1970's sci-fi inspired utopia, in which the main character's head flies around independently, taking control of different bodies in the world.  It is being developed by DoubleFine and Adult Swim Games, set for release in 2016.
results.name: Headlander

results.deck: A 2D action RPG with endless runner mechanics, reminiscent of 10,000,000.
results.name: Buff Knight Advanced

results.deck: Boss 101 is a shoot-em-up with a large focus on bosses. Players can fight randomly generated bosses or even build their own.
results.name: Boss 101 with S.T.E.V.E. and Max

results.deck: A sidescrolling stunt game, based on Pumped BMX 2 for mobile platforms, Pumped BMX+ is retooled for consoles.
results.name: Pumped BMX+

results.deck: The Battride War series begins pulling its roster from earlier incarnations of the tokusatsu heroes.
results.name: Kamen Rider: Battride War Genesis

results.deck: Evil robots are on a rampage and it's up to a squad of kittens to stop them.
results.name: Kitten Squad

results.deck: A four player local competitive multiplayer game.
results.name: Stardust Vanguards

results.deck: The King of Fighters returns for its 14th main installment.
results.name: The King of Fighters XIV

results.deck: An HD remake of the original Ryu ga Gotoku (Yakuza) game, for PlayStation 4.
results.name: Ryu ga Gotoku Kiwami

results.deck: The sixth chapter in the Yakuza series
results.name: Ryu ga Gotoku 6

results.deck: A competitive shooter developed by Capcom with elements of both third and first-person perspectives.
results.name: Umbrella Corps

results.deck: A One Piece fighting game developed by Spike Chunsoft for PlayStation 4, PlayStation Vita, and Xbox One.
results.name: One Piece: Burning Blood

results.deck: Final Kingdom Hearts HD Compilation containing an HD version of Dream Drop Distance and two brand new episodes. Unlike the two previous compilations, which were on Playstation 3, this one is for Playstation 4.
results.name: Kingdom Hearts HD II.8: Final Chapter Prologue

results.deck: Sequel to the Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Arcade for Arcade and the first Arcade version released on PlayStation 4
results.name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Future Tone

results.deck: Sci-fi themed game developed by Vanillaware for the PlayStation 4 and Vita.
results.name: 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim

results.deck: An open-ended country-life RPG in which players can manage their own farm and interact with the surrounding community.
results.name: Stardew Valley

results.deck: Stories: The Path of Destinies tells the tale of Reynardo, the last line of defense in a war against an invading armada.
results.name: Stories: The Path of Destinies

results.deck: Masquerada: Songs and Shadows is an isometric, "pause-for-tactics" role-playing game from Witching Hour Studios.
results.name: Masquerada: Songs and Shadows

results.deck: Control lasers to the beat in this dual analog stick rhythm game.
results.name: Laserlife

results.deck: 2D platformer that takes place in a circus arena.
results.name: Penarium

results.deck: Race a helicopter through 2D obstacle courses.
results.name: Rally Copters

results.deck: Battle head-to-head in a fast paced trivia game.
results.name: Battle Trivia Knockout

results.deck: The 2016 edition of the Powerful Pro Yakyuu series.
results.name: Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu 2016

results.deck: The Let's Sing franchise hops to the PlayStation 4,Xbox one and PC as well as continuing on the Wii.
results.name: Let's Sing 2016

results.deck: The MLB takes another swing in the 2016 edition of R.B.I. Baseball.
results.name: R.B.I. Baseball 16

results.deck: A heist themed action puzzle game set in New York.
results.name: Fat City

results.deck: A top down arcade racer where the player competes in multiple races at the same time.
results.name: Drive!Drive!Drive!

results.deck: The next Far Cry game will focus on prehistoric themes.
results.name: Far Cry: Primal

results.deck: Jackbox Games returns with five more comedic party games.
results.name: The Jackbox Party Pack 2

results.deck: Thrilling story-oriented sci-fi adventure on Mars. Puzzles, mysteries, hidden clues and objects... follow the three young astronauts trying to survive in the abandoned dome city.
results.name: Dome City

results.deck: A multiplayer twin-stick shooter from Armature Studio
results.name: Dead Star

results.deck: Cryptark is a 2D sci-fi roguelike shooter from Alientrap currently on Steam Early Access.
results.name: Cryptark

results.deck: A first person adventure game based on the Goosebumps series of horror themed children's books.
results.name: Goosebumps: The Game

results.deck: The forth game in the Sword Art Online franchise takes Kirito to a familiar looking yet new virtual world.
results.name: Sword Art Online: Hollow Realization

results.deck: A second prequel to the NBC television series "Heroes Reborn"
results.name: Gemini: Heroes Reborn

results.deck: A 2D Action Adventure/RPG.
results.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus

results.deck: An open-world action-RPG starring a dog lost in a sprawling, randomly generated city.
results.name: Home Free

results.deck: The Park is a first person psychological horror game from the developers of The Secret World.
results.name: The Park

results.deck: Toto Temple Deluxe is a fast-paced, local-multiplayer party game in which players must steal an egg-laying goat from their friends and try to keep it on their own head for as long as possible.
results.name: Toto Temple Deluxe

results.deck: The creator of the Kick Off series returns with a new top-down soccer game.
results.name: Dino Dini’s Kick Off Revival

results.deck: A combination fighting game/RPG for multi-platform release.
results.name: DarkEdeNight

results.deck: Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax Ignition adds additional characters, balance changes, and more.
results.name: Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax Ignition

results.deck: The definitive version of arcade-style shoot-'em-up Darius Burst, containing the enhancements from the Another Chronicle EX arcade version as well as new content.
results.name: Darius Burst: Chronicle Saviours

results.deck: Koei Tecmo's mythical Japan flavored demon hunting game gets its first fully fledged sequel.
results.name: Toukiden 2

results.deck: The 2016 edition of Koei Tecmo's long running horse racing sim.
results.name: Winning Post 8 2016

results.deck: Quantic Dream's android is getting a life of its own in future Detroit. Starring actress Valorie Curry as Kara.
results.name: Detroit: Become Human
